rows.label: tlk46320172_01_msg0001
rows.name:
You must be the party who were invited
here by His Holiness the Pope.
Good evening to you all.

rows.label: tlk46320172_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If you seek an audience with
His Holiness, head for the cathedral
on the far side of this plaza.

rows.label: tlk46320172_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you have time, I would recommend
taking a look at the cathedral's famous
mural of the creation of Alst.

rows.label: tlk46320172_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It is a priceless work of art unique
to Acedia. Many enjoy gazing upon it
and contemplating the distant past.
